attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public in 2020
attributes.additional_details: Members of the public should be banned from home firework use or unauthorised public displays this year because of the increased risk of spreading Covid-19. Retailers should be prevented by law from selling fireworks to the public during this pandemic.
attributes.background: The lack of public fireworks displays is likely to mean an increase in back garden firework parties, the guests at these parties will increase the danger of Covid-19 transmission.
